name: GRAVEYARD (brokenportals)
description:
Hey everyone. This is my first game on Itch.io, and also my first game using Bitsy.

Graveyard is a small game about a robotic ship called NOAH who has spent an eternity exploring a seemingly empty universe devoid of life, and searches for answers as to what had happened. 

Controls:

Use the arrow keys to move your character.

Interact with the white rectangular sprites to uncover the game's story.

Credits to:

Bitsy Game Maker by Adam Le Doux

pixsy by ruin
